casebody.data:
George RIFFLER, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6525. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Oct. 16, 1931.

Before WILBUR and SAWTELLE, Circuit Judges, and JAMES, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Pursuant to motion of Mr. Wellington D.. Rankin, United States attorney, counsel for appellee, ordered appeal dismissed for failure of appellant to file brief before argument; mandate forthwith.
